name: Spectator Hero
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move! M to Mute!

KILLS YOU: Laser, Boxes, Red Pillars

DOESN'T: Blue circles, Green Circle, Black Pillars

MORE POINTS: Stand in Green Circle

Music:

Glorious Morning - Waterflame
